data.eml:eml: description of a new species of cardinalfish from the Indo­West Pacific (Perciformes: Apogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fraser, Thomas H. (2005): description of a new species of cardinalfish from the Indo­West Pacific (Perciformes: Apogonidae). Zootaxa 924: 1-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171086
